attributes.action: ask stagecoach bus company to compromise and put a  skeleton bus service  in place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
stagecoach cancelled bus 53 to upper pleasley due to lack of funds from derbyshire county council and the gold card.there are no shops for essentials in this area thus making living in this location very difficult for young and old people this area is situated on top of a very steep and long 3/4 of a mile hill. please help desperate residence before the bad weather. a skeleton service would be great.yours truly,
patricia winterton
upper pleasley 
derbyshire
01623 812640
